reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress looks exactly like the image and appreciate its quality, comfort, and value for money. Moreover, they consider it a good party dress, with one mentioning it's perfect for bachelorette parties. However, the fit and size receive mixed feedback - while some find it perfect, others say it's too short, and while some find it flattering, others disagree. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very cute
items.body: Very cute, I was afraid it was going to be boxy and it’s not at all. Not scratchy either Read more
items.author: Jerry Kessler

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute, comfy, and fun!
items.body: Got this to wear to a concert and it did NOT disappoint! Really good quality! Was so comfortable! It does run a little on the short side… but a pair of spandex shorts under was the way to go!! Would definitely order again in another color as well! Read more
items.author: Dayna Peiffer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice quality for a low price!
items.body: The dress wasn't as form fitting as expected, but the fit was right, it wasn't damaged and the sequins stayed on. Found dresses almost identical on other sites for double, or triple the price. It was used for a Bachelorette Disco Night, and it was the perfect dress for the occasion and on a budget! Read more
items.author: Kara H.

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Don’t buy
items.body: Color and dress poor quality. Don’t waste your money Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So much better than expected!
items.body: I had to buy as a last minute replacement dress for a Christmas party. This dress is adorable and well made. I didn’t expect much from it, but I will wear again and again whenever I can. I’ve read reviews saying the cheat was tight. I am a pretty fit person with 34 C chest and the small was PERFECT. I love how the top wasn’t low cut too. It was shorter but that’s pretty obvious with all the measurements but perfect for me. Read more
items.author: Heather R.

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Only for members of the IBTC!
items.body: Beautiful, well made garment fit great all over - EXCEPT the teeny chest area. I bought XL and I wear a 14 with D cup. This thing squashed me flat even with a padded push up. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice appearance, fast delivery
items.body: Very good quality of sewing and fabric, soft lining. I'm 5'2" and the length is just above the knees -it works very well for me, not too short. The shape is trapeze - it covers all unpleasant unevenness of my body but shows my best parts. I bought silver and green - I keep both of them Read more
items.author: Laura

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great fit
items.body: Worked perfect. I am 5’9” 170 and got an extra large. Washed it inside out and was still perfect. Also, the length was great. Read more
items.author: Shannon Lee Coates

short_description:
Womens Dress Short Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Dress Short Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Gold, Silver, Black, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
